coreValues.description: We believe customers deserve to know exactly what goes into our products and where it comes from
coreValues.expression: Full ingredient disclosure, supply chain traceability, and open communication about our practices

coreValues.description: We're committed to regenerative practices that leave the earth better than we found it
coreValues.expression: 100% organic ingredients, carbon-neutral shipping, compostable packaging, and support for regenerative farming

coreValues.description: We grow stronger together, supporting farmers, customers, and local communities
coreValues.expression: Fair-trade partnerships, customer education programs, and 1% of revenue to environmental nonprofits

coreValues.description: We cut through wellness industry noise to deliver straightforward, effective products
coreValues.expression: Minimal ingredient lists, clear labeling, honest marketing without exaggerated claims

brandVoice.personality: Like a trusted friend who's passionate about wellness - informed but never preachy, enthusiastic but grounded in reality
doList: Acknowledge that sustainable living is a journey, not perfection
Be honest about our challenges and progress
dontList: Shame or guilt-trip about lifestyle choices
Talk down to customers or assume ignorance
Use corporate jargon or buzzwords without substance

primary.demographics: Women aged 28-45, primarily suburban and urban, household income $60k-$120k, college-educated, parents or planning to be
primary.psychographics: Health-conscious, environmentally aware, values quality over quantity, willing to pay premium for trusted brands, active on social media, seeks work-life balance
painPoints: Skeptical of greenwashing and false claims
Limited time to research every product
Want to support sustainable brands but confused by options
Concerned about family health and environmental legacy
aspirations: Provide the healthiest options for their families
Make purchasing decisions that align with their values
Simplify their wellness routines without sacrificing quality
Be part of a community working toward positive change
Leave a better world for their children

secondary.demographics: Men and women aged 22-35, urban millennials and Gen Z, income $35k-$70k, environmentally passionate
secondary.psychographics: Digitally native, cause-driven, prioritize experiences and values over material goods, seek authentic brands, influenced by peer recommendations and social proof
painPoints: Want to align purchases with environmental values
Need social proof before trying new brands
aspirations: Build sustainable habits early in life

products.name: Organic Superfood Blends
products.description: Nutrient-dense powder blends made from single-origin organic superfoods
products.valueProposition: Get the full spectrum of vitamins and minerals from whole foods, not synthetic supplements
differentiators: Third-party tested for purity and potency
No fillers, sweeteners, or artificial ingredients
Complete transparency on sourcing and testing

products.name: Herbal Wellness Teas
products.description: Functional tea blends using traditional herbs for modern wellness needs
products.valueProposition: Ancient wisdom meets modern research for delicious, effective daily rituals
differentiators: Each blend supports a specific wellness goal

products.name: Essential Wellness Bundles
products.description: Curated starter sets for those new to plant-based wellness
products.valueProposition: Everything you need to begin your wellness journey, thoughtfully bundled
differentiators: Perfect for gifting or starting your own practice

pricing.strategy: Premium value with transparent cost breakdown
pricing.positioning: Higher than mass-market supplements but competitive with premium organic brands. Pricing reflects true cost of sustainable, organic sourcing and fair-trade practices. We publish a cost breakdown showing how much goes to farmers, production, and impact initiatives.

messaging.missionStatement: To make organic, sustainable wellness accessible and understandable, connecting conscious consumers directly with the farms and practices that nourish both people and planet.
messaging.visionStatement: A future where wellness products come exclusively from regenerative sources, where transparency is the norm, and where every purchase supports thriving farming communities and healthy ecosystems.

keyMessages.message: You shouldn't need a chemistry degree to understand your supplements
keyMessages.context: When introducing products or discussing ingredient transparency
supportingPoints: Every ingredient sourced from a single organic farm we can name
Clear, simple labels with nothing to hide
Educational resources to help you understand what you're taking and why

keyMessages.message: Sustainable wellness shouldn't break the bank
keyMessages.context: When addressing price concerns or positioning value
supportingPoints: Concentrated formulas mean less product needed

keyMessages.message: Your wellness journey supports farm families and ecosystems
supportingPoints: We pay farmers 30% above fair-trade prices
1% of revenue to regenerative agriculture education
Full supply chain transparency on every product
Growing network of 150+ organic family farms

messaging.elevatorPitch: GreenLeaf Organics connects health-conscious consumers directly with organic farms through transparent, sustainably-sourced superfood blends and herbal teas. We believe you shouldn't need a chemistry degree to understand your supplements - every ingredient comes from a single farm we can name, in packaging that goes back to the earth. It's wellness that's good for you and good for the planet.
messaging.brandStory: GreenLeaf Organics was born from a frustrating search for supplements my pregnant wife could trust. As I dug into the wellness industry, I was shocked by the lack of transparency, synthetic ingredients marketed as 'natural,' and the disconnect between products and their supposed organic sources. After visiting a family-owned organic farm in Vermont and tasting the difference real, fresh superfoods could make, I knew there was a better way. We started with one product - a simple organic spirulina blend from that Vermont farm - and a promise: complete transparency, genuinely sustainable practices, and direct farmer partnerships. Five years later, we work with 150+ organic farms across the Americas, we've helped over 50,000 families simplify their wellness routines, and we've invested $2M back into regenerative agriculture education. But our mission hasn't changed: make organic, sustainable wellness simple, transparent, and accessible.

colorPalette.meaning: Deep forest green represents our connection to nature and growth, fresh leaf green symbolizes vitality and renewal, warm cream provides organic warmth, golden yellow evokes sunshine and optimism, earthy red grounds us in the soil and harvest

typography.usage: Poppins for digital interfaces, packaging, and headlines to convey modern, clean aesthetic. Lora for storytelling, educational content, and anywhere we want to create warmth and trust.

imagery.style: Bright, natural lifestyle photography with real farmers, real customers, and real ingredients
imagery.guidelines: Showcase the journey from farm to table. Feature diverse farmers and customers in natural settings with natural lighting. Include close-ups of ingredients in their whole form. Avoid overly styled or artificial-looking shots. Prioritize authenticity over perfection. Include nature textures, soil, plants, hands working the earth.

competitivePositioning.uniqueSellingProposition: The only superfood and herbal wellness brand that offers 100% single-farm traceability for every ingredient, published fair-trade pricing, and compostable packaging - making truly sustainable, transparent wellness accessible.
competitivePositioning.marketPosition: Premium organic wellness leader for conscious consumers who demand transparency and won't compromise on sustainability or quality.

channels.strategy: Instagram for community building, educational content, and farmer stories. Email for customer retention, education, and product launches. Website optimized for conversion with transparent sourcing info. Facebook for reaching older demographics and community building. Pinterest for recipe inspiration and wellness content discovery. In-person events to build local connections and let customers meet the brand.

contentPillars.description: Behind-the-scenes content featuring our partner farmers, their practices, and the land
examples: Harvest season updates from specific farms
Day in the life at partner farms

contentPillars.description: Evidence-based information about herbs, superfoods, and holistic health
examples: How to use our products for specific goals

contentPillars.description: Transparency about our practices, impact metrics, and industry education
examples: Our carbon footprint and reduction efforts

contentPillars.description: User-generated content, customer stories, and creative ways to use products

campaigns.name: Harvest Season 2024
campaigns.objective: Launch limited-edition harvest blends and drive awareness of farm partnerships
keyMessages: Celebrate harvest with limited-edition blends featuring peak-season ingredients
Meet the farmers behind your favorite products

campaigns.name: New Year Wellness Reset
campaigns.objective: Acquire new customers during wellness-focused January, introduce starter bundles
keyMessages: Simple, sustainable wellness for real life
No extreme cleanses, just whole-food nutrition
Start your wellness journey with complete transparency
